content.text: Doing well, just got back from a nice vacation. Where are you from?
I'm from the Midwest, but I live on a small farm in Texas now.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to go to Texas! What's it like living on a farm?
It's pretty great! I love being outdoors and working with my hands.
That's so cool! What kind of animals do you have?
I have cows, pigs, chickens, and horses.
Wow, that's a lot of animals! How do you keep track of them all?
It can be a challenge, but it's fun! I love spending time with my animals.
I bet! They must be really cute.
They are! I love watching them play and run around.
That's so sweet! What's your favorite part about living on a farm?
I think my favorite part is the fresh air and the beautiful scenery.
That sounds amazing! I'm sure it's a great place to relax.
It is! I love spending my days outside, working on the farm.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy it.
